name: Advent Chemicals

idea:
Company brief

Industricals is India's first end-to-end supply chain tech based solution for electrical and property improvement retailers(one of India's largest and growing sectors).


Industricals offers specialised technology, benefits of organisation at scale and supports retailers conversion to a formal economy fulfilling orders placed online, with our own technology, warehousing, stock and credit management systems.


Team Profile:

We are currently a team of 12 people across functions.

Founders:

Ridhi Doongursee : BSc.(Hons)Computer Science + Business (Uni. Of Warwick) Extensive experience with Operations, Manufacturing, Product launch, Start-ups

Yashonandan Mundhra : B.A. (Economics) McGill University.


Business model:

Customers order on our mobile app, a mix of stock products and partner products, and are delivered the products to their store, within 24 hours.


We have the operational set-up, in-depth domain knowledge and ability to give credit while sustaining and serving customer needs in the long run.


We aim to fulfil 80 percent of the products being purchased by an electrical retailer - Reduce cost of transactions by our technology, processes and partnerships and pass those benefits on to the customers.
name: INDUSTRICALS ONLINE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
EzeeWezee provides “Uber++” like services for photo and video shoots. Given the proliferation of e-commerce and image sharing platforms, the need to have good quality pictures is prevalent across the country. EzeeWezee provides photography/videography services to B2B (corporates & small businesses/MSME) and B2C segments.

From buyer perspective, customers get an intuitive platform where they can select the kind of images they need, exact usage for the images and the logistics (venue, time) for the shoot. Customers can vary the image style or quantity based on their budget. EzeeWezee demystifies the technical aspects behind photo & video shoots and gives customers clean, ready-to-use media files in the format suitable for their needs.

From service provider perspective, nuances of professional photography with respect to customer acquisition, right pricing, right techniques etc for different genre of photography/videography is not well understood. This leaves both sides of value chain – the buyer and the supplier – dissatisfied and unsure of right price & quality. Ezeewezee’s objective is to standardize this.

EzeeWezee assures customers of the quality of the shoot. Basis customer requirements and budget, EzeeWezee will assign trained photographers to execute the job. We then filter and clean up the images and share with customers. Many of these interventions will be AI based. We are also focusing on skill tiering, measurement and skill development of photography and videography professionals.
name: EZEEWEZEE PRIVATE LIMITED
